summary: Use this call to add a new shop collecion
description: Use this call to add a new shop collecion

query.name: page_size
query.description: Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. The parameter range of page_size should be [1, 2147483647]

query.name: page_no
query.description: Specifies the total returned data per entry. The parameter range of page_no should be [1, 100]

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking

schema.name: error
schema.description: The name of the error raised in the request. The error will be empty if the request succeeds.

schema.name: message
schema.description: The detailed description of the error. The message will be empty if the request succeeds.

schema.name: total_count
schema.description: This is to indicate the whole number of in-shop categories under the shop.

schema.name: more
schema.description: This is to indicate whether the list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve the rest.
